name: Prazosin

dosing.adult_maintenance: PTSD: 2-15 mg at bedtime (typical 5-10 mg); Hypertension: 2-20 mg/day divided BID-TID
dosing.notes: Off-label for PTSD nightmares (evidence mixed); alpha-1 blocker; take at bedtime; first-dose hypotension risk

canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 1-2 mg every 3-7 days; titrate to effect
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 1-2 mg qHS; increase every 3-7 days; monitor BP
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 1 mg qHS; warn about first-dose hypotension; titrate weekly to 5-10 mg

warnings: First-dose hypotension - take at bedtime; advise to sit/lie down if dizziness
Mixed evidence for PTSD nightmares (some negative trials; may help some patients)

cautions.renal: Use with caution; start with lower dose
cautions.hepatic: Use with caution; reduce dose in hepatic impairment
